{/*---------- Row 1 ----------*/} this.setState({ CustomerName: event.target.value }) } name="productName" /> {/* TODO: Convert into MDBSelect */} this.setState({ CategoryName: val[0], }) } label="Select Category" /> this.setState({ productBrand: event.target.value, }) } name="productBrand" /> {/*---------- Row 2 ----------*/} this.setState({ productModel: event.target.value, }) } name="productModel" /> this.setState({ productCode: event.target.value, }) } name="productCode" /> this.setState({ productQuantity: event.target.value, }) } name="productQuantity" /> {/*---------- Row 3 ----------*/} this.setState({ productSize: event.target.value, }) } name="productSize" /> this.setState({ productColor: event.target.value, }) } name="productColor" /> this.setState({ productPurchasePrice: event.target.value, }) } name="productPurchasePrice" /> {/*---------- Row 4 ----------*/} this.setState({ productRetailPrice: event.target.value, }) } name="productRetailPrice" /> this.setState({ productDiscountPrice: event.target.value, }) } name="productDiscountPrice" /> this.setState({ productStatus: event.target.value, }) } name="productStatus" /> this.setState({ fileToUpload: event.target.files[0].name, }) } > {/* console.log(picture)} imgExtension={[".jpg", ".gif", ".png", ".gif"]} maxFileSize={5242880} withPreview={true} /> */}
